page.title: 05Social Activities.
page.content: The Womens' Institute Hall in Northwood is a social centre. Sometimes jumble sales are held there. A jumble sale is when you bring things you don't want any more. Toys, books,dolls and clothes are what you bring and people buy them for about 10p.. Sometimes you go to parties there and Playschool is held there on every weekday except Thursdays.Sometimes ladies go there and play whist, they talk and hold competitions. The hall is used for drama and plays.There is dancing every Thursday. The May Day festival is held there every year and children dance the Maypole Dance where they hold ribbons and dance in and out round the pole.THere are other traditional dances for the May Queen.
